creator: Paget96
descriptionHtml:
🔋BatteryGuru monitors and help you optimizing battery health & performance with tips to prolong battery life and increase its lifespan by 200%.

⭐Designed to keep battery in the best condition and bring it healthy life.

BatteryGuru contains four sections:

📊Info
- Section dedicated for battery stats including charge/discharge percentage and estimated time for full charge/discharge.
Section also provide info about awake and deep sleep time of the device.

🛡️Protection
- At protection section you can set reminders for battery temperature and charging limits. As we know those are two unwanted factors who degrade our batteries. Use suggested protectors to prolong your battery life and keep it in nice condition.

💊Health
- Health section contain useful tips for saving our beloved battery, everything is well described and "human readable".

🧪Save
- Save section contains saving modes, two of them are already managed and unchangeable, while one remains customizable. Manually managed mode automatically reads device current state.


BatteryGuru doesn’t require root, access to privacy-sensitive information and won't show false info to user.

Support chat:
https://www.t.me/BatteryGuru
descriptionShort: Extend battery life with tips and customizable saving modes from BatteryGuru

title: Battery Guru

creator: Paget96
descriptionHtml:
🔋Battery Guru monitors and help you optimizing battery health & performance with tips to prolong battery life and increase its lifespan by 200%.

⭐Designed to keep battery in the best condition and bring it healthy life.

Battery Guru contains four sections:

📊Info
- Section dedicated for battery stats including charge/discharge percentage and estimated time for full charge/discharge.
Section also provide info about awake and deep sleep time of the device.

🛡️Protection
- At protection section you can set reminders for battery temperature and charging limits. As we know those are two unwanted factors who degrade our batteries. Use suggested protectors to prolong your battery life and keep it in nice condition.

💊Health
- Health section contain useful tips for saving our beloved battery, everything is well described and "human readable".

🧪Save
- Save section contains saving modes, two of them are already managed and unchangeable, while one remains customizable. Manually managed mode automatically reads device current state.

💤Doze
- Save more battery with fine tuning Doze on your device. Make your device go idle faster which means less power consumption while screen is off.
This section have other options such aggressive doze (make default doze behavior aggressive much as possible and reduce power consumption), doze optimization will enable preloaded doze setup by Battery Guru to maximize your battery life. Good configured doze will make your device sleep as a baby, this is definitely the best and the most perfect battery saver.
To use Doze features without Root you need to grant it DUMP permission via ADB on your computer by executing this command:

adb -d shell pm grant com.paget96.batteryguru android.permission.DUMP

You also need to grant WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS permission:

adb -d shell pm grant com.paget96.batteryguru android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS

Battery Guru doesn’t require root, access to privacy-sensitive information and won't show false info to user.

Other features:
- App statistics about runtime and drain
- Capacity info

Support chat:
https://www.t.me/BatteryGuru
descriptionShort: Extend battery life with tips and customizable saving modes from BatteryGuru

creator: Paget96
descriptionHtml:
🔋Battery Guru monitors, show estimates and helps you change your charging habits with useful tips to prolong battery life and increase its lifespan by 200%.

⭐Designed to keep the battery in the best condition and bring it a healthy life
⭐Taking care about battery health and optimize its performance

Batteries have a limited lifespan. Every time you charge your device, it wears out the battery, lowering it's total (design) capacity.
Now, you can boost mobile battery life, spend less time with your Android device attached to its battery charger and get more out of your mobile life without constant concerns about the low battery level.
Use Battery Guru to find the fastest charger and USB cable for your device. Measure the charging current (in mA) to find out! The app will show you max current achieved while charging.

Easy to use application interface, you just need to download and launch. The application will do the rest.

📊Info
- Section dedicated for battery stats including charge/discharge percentage and estimated time for full charge/discharge.
Display information about battery: voltage, temperature, capacity, and battery health status, battery charger history...
The section also provides info about App statistics, awake and deep sleep time of the device.

🛡️Protection
- At the protection section you can set reminders for battery temperature and charging limits. As we know those are two unwanted factors that degrade our batteries. Use suggested protectors prolong your battery life and keep it in nice condition.

💊Health
- Health section contain useful tips for saving our beloved battery, everything is well described and "human-readable".

🧪Save
- Save section contains saving modes, two of them are already managed and unchangeable, while one remains customizable. Manually managed mode automatically reads the device current state.

💤Doze
- Save more battery with fine-tuning Doze on your device. Make your device go idle faster which means less power consumption while the screen is off.
Enabling aggressive doze to make default doze behavior aggressive much as possible and reduce power consumption, doze optimization will set perfectly optimized parameters to maximize your battery life. Well configured doze will make your device sleep like a baby, this is definitely the best and the most perfect battery saver.

To use Doze features without Root you need to grant it DUMP permission via ADB on your computer by executing this command:

adb -d shell pm grant com.paget96.batteryguru android.permission.DUMP

You also need to grant WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS permission:

adb -d shell pm grant com.paget96.batteryguru android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS

Battery Guru doesn’t require root, access to privacy-sensitive information, and won't show false info to users.

Support chat:
https://www.t.me/BatteryGuru
descriptionShort: The best way to extend battery life of your Android devices and keep it healthy

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
v1.7.6
- Updated app UI
- Added advanced view of charging records
- Fixed issue with min and max mA
- Bug fixes and improvements

title: Battery Guru - Battery Monitor - Battery Saver

creator: Paget96
descriptionHtml:
🔋Battery Guru monitors, show estimates, and helps you change your charging habits with useful tips to prolong battery life and increase its lifespan by 200%.

⭐Designed to keep the battery in the best condition and bring it a healthy life
⭐Taking care of battery health and optimize its performance
⭐Showing the health of your battery

Batteries have a limited lifespan. Every time you charge your device, it wears out the battery, lowering its total (design) capacity.
Now, you can boost mobile battery life, spend less time with your Android device attached to its battery charger and get more out of your mobile life without constant concerns about the low battery level.
Use Battery Guru to find the fastest charger and USB cable for your device. Measure the charging current (in mA) to find out! The app will show you max current achieved while charging.

📊Info
- Section dedicated for battery stats including charge/discharge percentage and estimated time for full charge/discharge.
Display information about battery: voltage, temperature, capacity, and battery health status, battery charger history...
The section also provides info about App statistics, awake and deep sleep time of the device.

- Charging records are also part of the info section, this will tell you how much you take care of the device battery is your charging healthy or not. Charging records also have advanced info to show you charging history for the last 3 months.

🛡️Protection
- At the protection section you can set reminders for battery temperature and charging limits. As we know those are two unwanted factors that degrade our batteries. Use suggested protectors to prolong your battery life and keep it in nice condition.

💊Health
- Health section contain useful tips for saving our beloved battery, everything is well described and "human-readable".

🧪Save
- Save section contains saving modes, two of them are already managed and unchangeable, while one remains customizable. Manually managed mode automatically reads the device current state.

💤Doze
- Save more battery with fine-tuning Doze on your device. Make your device go idle faster which means less power consumption while the screen is off.
Enabling aggressive doze to make default doze behavior aggressive much as possible and reduce power consumption, doze optimization will set perfectly optimized parameters to maximize your battery life. Well configured doze will make your device sleep like a baby, this is definitely the best and the most perfect battery saver.

To use Doze features without Root you need to grant it DUMP permission via ADB on your computer by executing this command:

adb -d shell pm grant com.paget96.batteryguru android.permission.DUMP

You also need to grant WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS permission:

adb -d shell pm grant com.paget96.batteryguru android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS

Battery Guru doesn’t require root, access to privacy-sensitive information, and won't show false info to users.

Support chat:
https://www.t.me/Paget96_Projects
descriptionShort: The best way to extend battery life of your Android devices and keep it healthy

title: Battery Guru - Battery Monitor - Battery Saver

creator: Paget96
descriptionHtml:
🔋Battery Guru monitors, show estimates, and helps you change your charging habits with useful tips to prolong battery life and increase its lifespan by 200%.

⭐Designed to keep the battery in the best condition and bring it a healthy life
⭐Taking care of battery health and optimize its performance
⭐Showing the health of your battery

Batteries have a limited lifespan. Every time you charge your device, it wears out the battery, lowering its total (design) capacity.
Now, you can boost mobile battery life, spend less time with your Android device attached to its battery charger and get more out of your mobile life without constant concerns about the low battery level.
Use Battery Guru to find the fastest charger and USB cable for your device. Measure the charging current (in mA) to find out! The app will show you max current achieved while charging.

Multiple indicators, show current mA, temperature, battery level and combination of them on statusbar icon.

📊Charging/Discharging info
- Section dedicated for battery stats including charge/discharge percentage and estimated time for full charge/discharge.
Display information about battery: voltage, temperature, capacity, and battery health status, battery charger history...
The section also provides info about App statistics, awake and deep sleep time of the device.

- Charging records are also part of the info section, this will tell you how much you take care of the device battery is your charging healthy or not. Charging records also have advanced info to show you charging history for the last 3 months.

🛡️Protection
- At the protection section you can set reminders for battery temperature and charging limits. As we know those are two unwanted factors that degrade our batteries. Use suggested protectors to prolong your battery life and keep it in nice condition.

💊Health
- Get estimated battery health at any time. Health section also contain useful tips for saving our beloved battery, everything is well described and "human-readable".

💤Doze
- Save more battery with fine-tuning Doze on your device. Make your device go idle faster which means less power consumption while the screen is off.
Enabling aggressive doze to make default doze behavior aggressive much as possible and reduce power consumption, doze optimization will set perfectly optimized parameters to maximize your battery life. Well configured doze will make your device sleep like a baby, this is definitely the best and the most perfect battery saver.

To use Doze features without Root you need to grant it DUMP permission via ADB on your computer by executing this command:

adb -d shell pm grant com.paget96.batteryguru android.permission.DUMP

You also need to grant WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS permission:

adb -d shell pm grant com.paget96.batteryguru android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS

🧪Save
- Save section contains saving modes, two of them are already managed and unchangeable, while one remains customizable. Manually managed mode automatically reads the device current state.


Support chat:
https://www.t.me/Paget96_Projects
descriptionShort: The best way to extend battery life of your Android devices and keep it healthy

❤ Showing the health of your battery

🏆 Designed to keep the battery in the best condition and bring it a healthy life
⭐ Taking care of battery health and optimize its performance
❤ Showing the health of your battery

Batteries have a limited lifespan, every time you charge your device it wears out the battery, lowering it's total (design) capacity.
Now, you can reduce wear, spend less time with your device attached to its charger and get more out of your mobile life without constant concerns about the low battery level.

title: Battery Guru: Battery Health

creator: Paget96
descriptionHtml:
🔋 Battery Guru displays battery usage information, measures battery capacity (mAh), show estimates, and helps you change your charging habits with useful tips to prolong battery life and increase its lifespan.
Monitor battery voltage, electric current, temperature and much more

🏆 Designed to keep the battery in the best condition and bring it a healthy life
⭐ Taking care of battery health and optimize its performance
❤ Showing the health of your battery

Batteries have a limited lifespan, every time you charge your device it wears out the battery, lowering it's total (design) capacity.
Now, you can reduce wear, spend less time with your device attached to its charger and get more out of your mobile life without constant concerns about the low battery level.
Use Battery Guru to find the fastest charger and USB cable for your device. Measure the charging current (in mA) to find out!
The app will show you max current achieved while charging.

HIGHLIGHTS
- Measure real battery capacity (in mAh), dual battery configuration is also supported.
- Calibrate battery and charging controller tips
- Use the charge and temperature alarm notification to prolong battery lifespan.
- Detailed applications usage
- Insight into wake-locks since last unplug
- Remaining charge time - know how long it takes before your battery is charged.
- Remaining use time - know when you will run out of battery.
- Screen On/Off estimations.
- Check the percentage of deep sleep and awake time
- Detailed ongoing notification for real-time battery statistics
- Doze editor (Up to Android 11)
- Advanced system battery saver
- Dual battery configuration support
- And much more

Choose status bar indicator based on your need:
- Current mA
- Temperature
- Battery level
- And combination of them

📊 Charging/Discharging
- Sections dedicated for battery stats including charge/discharge percentage and estimated time for full charge/discharge.
Display information about battery: voltage, temperature, capacity, and battery health status, battery charging/discharging history...
The section also provides info about App statistics, wake-locks and deep sleep/awake time of the device.

- Charging records are also part of the charging section, this will tell you how much you take care of the device battery is your charging healthy or not. Charging records also have advanced info to show your charging history for the last 3 months.

Discharging section provided discharging history including advanced stats so you can get precisely insights about the discharging

🛡️ Protection
- At the protection section, you can set reminders for battery temperature, charging limits, and abnormal battery usage. When any of the thresholds is reached, battery guru will notify you with notification.

💊 Health
- Get estimated battery health at any time. Health section also contains useful tips for saving the battery and extend its lifespan.

💤 Doze (Android 11 and below)
- Save more battery with fine-tuning Doze on your device. Make your device go idle faster which means less power consumption while the screen is off.
Enabling aggressive doze to make default doze behavior aggressive much as possible and reduce power consumption, doze optimization will set perfectly optimized parameters to maximize your battery life. Well configured doze will make your device sleep like a baby, this is definitely the best and the most perfect battery saver.

🧪 Save
- This section gives you more power over the Android system battery saver, use the extended version of it, and set whether you want a dark theme, vibrations, animations, data saving while it's enabled.
The section also offers various battery saving profiles.

Support chat:
https://www.t.me/Paget96_Projects

Help translating:
https://www.paget96projects.com/help-translating-apps.html

Instagram
https://www.instagram.com/battery_guru
descriptionShort: Monitor battery voltage, electric current, temperature and much more

- Updated implementation for Charging Alarm

title: Battery Guru: Battery Health

Monitor battery voltage, electric current, temperature and much more.

🏆 Designed to keep the battery in the best condition and bring it a healthy life
⭐ Taking care of battery health and optimize its performance
❤ Showing the health of your battery

Batteries have a limited lifespan, every time you charge your device it wears out the battery, lowering it's total (design) capacity.
Now, you can reduce wear, spend less time with your device attached to its charger and get more out of your mobile life without constant concerns about the low battery level.
Use Battery Guru to find the fastest charger and USB cable for your device. Measure the charging current (in mA) to find out!
The app will show you max current achieved while charging.

HIGHLIGHTS
- Measure real battery capacity (in mAh), dual battery configuration is also supported.
- Calibrate battery and charging controller tips
- Use the charge and temperature alarm notification to prolong battery lifespan.
- Detailed applications usage
- Insight into wake-locks since last unplug
- Remaining charge time - know how long it takes before your battery is charged.
- Remaining use time - know when you will run out of battery.
- Screen On/Off estimations.
- Check the percentage of deep sleep and awake time
- Detailed ongoing notification for real-time battery statistics
- Doze editor (Up to Android 11)
- Advanced system battery saver
- Dual battery configuration support
- And much more

Choose status bar indicator based on your need:

title: Battery Guru: Battery Health

creator: Paget96
descriptionHtml:
🔋 Battery Guru - Monitor your Phone's Battery Life

Battery Guru is the perfect solution to help you monitor
the battery of your phone. With this app, you'll get detailed information about your battery usage, monitor its health, and receive tips on how to extend its lifespan.

🏆 Designed to help you keeping battery in the best condition and bring it a healthy life, Battery Guru is an essential tool for anyone who wants to make the most out of their phone's battery. You'll be able to see the health of your battery at a glance and take the necessary steps to keep it healthy and functioning optimally.

Features:

Battery Guru comes with a host of features that are designed to inform you about your current battery stats and help you maximize your phone's battery life. Here are just a few:

• Measure real battery capacity (in mAh) and dual battery configuration is also supported.
• Calibrate your battery and charging controller for optimal performance.
• Set charge and temperature alarms to prolong battery lifespan.
• Monitor application usage and wake-locks since last unplug.
• Check the remaining charge time and use time.
• Estimate screen on/off time.
• Check the percentage of deep sleep and awake time.
• Get detailed ongoing notification for real-time battery statistics.
• Choose a status bar indicator based on your needs.
• Monitor charging and discharging history.
• Set reminders for battery temperature, charging limits, and abnormal battery usage.
• Get estimated battery health at any time.

Choose status bar indicator based on your need:
• Electric current
• Temperature
• Battery level
• And combination of them

What our users say:
"Amazing app! It gives so much information about my battery and really helps me take better care of it." - John S.
"Battery Guru is a must-have app for anyone who wants to get the most out of their phone's battery. Highly recommend!" - Sarah L.

Technical requirements:
Battery Guru requires Android 6.0 and up to run.

Contact us:
For support, please visit our Telegram chat: https://www.t.me/Paget96_Projects

To help translate our app, visit: https://www.paget96projects.com/help-translating-apps.html

Follow us on Instagram for news and updates: https://www.instagram.com/battery_guru/
descriptionShort: Monitor phone's battery usage and accurately estimate its current health

title: Battery Guru: Battery Health

creator: Paget96
descriptionHtml:
🔋 Battery Guru - Monitor your Phone's Battery Life

Battery Guru is the perfect solution to help you monitor
the battery of your phone. With this app, you'll get detailed information about your battery usage, monitor its health, and receive tips on how to extend its lifespan.

🏆 Designed to help you keeping battery in the best condition and bring it a healthy life, Battery Guru is an essential tool for anyone who wants to make the most out of their phone's battery. You'll be able to see the health of your battery at a glance and take the necessary steps to keep it healthy and functioning optimally.

Features:

Battery Guru comes with a host of features that are designed to inform you about your current battery stats and help you maximize your phone's battery life. Here are just a few:

• Measure real battery capacity (in mAh) and dual battery configuration is also supported.
• Calibrate your battery and charging controller for optimal performance.
• Set charge and temperature alarms to prolong battery lifespan.
• Monitor application usage and wake-locks since last unplug.
• Check the remaining charge time and use time.
• Estimate screen on/off time.
• Check the percentage of deep sleep and awake time.
• Get detailed ongoing notification for real-time battery statistics.
• Choose a status bar indicator based on your needs.
• Monitor charging and discharging history.
• Set reminders for battery temperature, charging limits, and abnormal battery usage.
• Get estimated battery health at any time.

Choose status bar indicator based on your need:
• Electric current
• Temperature
• Battery level
• And combination of them

What our users say:
"Amazing app! It gives so much information about my battery and really helps me take better care of it." - John S.
"Battery Guru is a must-have app for anyone who wants to get the most out of their phone's battery. Highly recommend!" - Sarah L.

Technical requirements:
Battery Guru requires Android 6.0 and up to run.

title: Battery Guru: Battery Health

creator: Paget96
descriptionHtml:
🔋 Battery Guru - Monitor your Phone's Battery Life

Battery Guru is the perfect solution to help you monitor
the battery of your phone. With this app, you'll get detailed information about your battery usage, monitor its health, and receive tips on how to extend its lifespan.

🏆 Battery Guru is a helpful tool that provides insights into the health of your phone's battery. By monitoring your battery's health, you can take proactive steps to ensure that it remains in good condition and performs optimally.

Features:
Battery Guru offers various features that aim to provide you with essential information about your phone's battery and help you extend its life. Some of these features include:

• Measure real battery capacity (in mAh) and dual battery configuration is also supported.
• Calibrate your battery and charging controller for optimal performance.
• Set charge and temperature alarms to prolong battery lifespan.
• Monitor application usage and wake-locks since last unplug.
• Check the remaining charge time and use time.
• Estimate screen on/off time.
• Check the percentage of deep sleep and awake time.
• Get detailed ongoing notification for real-time battery statistics.
• Choose a status bar indicator based on your needs.
• Monitor charging and discharging history.
• Set reminders for battery temperature, charging limits, and abnormal battery usage.
• Get estimated battery health at any time.

Choose status bar indicator based on your need:
• Electric current
• Temperature
• Battery level
• And combination of them

What our users say:
"Amazing app! It gives so much information about my battery and really helps me take better care of it." - John S.
"Battery Guru is a must-have app for anyone who wants to get the most out of their phone's battery. Highly recommend!" - Sarah L.

Technical requirements:
Battery Guru requires Android 6.0 and up to run.

title: Battery Guru: Battery Health

creator: Paget96
descriptionHtml:
Battery Guru - Monitor your Phone's Battery Life



Battery Guru is a comprehensive app that provides detailed information about your phone's battery health, usage, and lifespan.

With this app, you can monitor your battery's capacity, set alarms and reminders, and get real-time statistics to your usage.
With a variety of features at your fingertips, you can easily monitor and track your battery's performance.
🪫 Say goodbye to low battery situation all time and hello to Battery Guru - the ultimate Android app for monitoring your phone's battery.

🏆 Battery Guru is a helpful tool that provides insights into the health of your phone's battery. By monitoring your battery's health,
you can take proactive steps to ensure that it remains in good condition and performs optimally.

🔋 Battery health refers to the condition and performance of a battery, which can deteriorate over time and usage. It is important to monitor and maintain battery health for several reasons:

• Performance: As batteries degrade, their ability to hold a charge and provide power diminishes, leading to reduced performance and shorter battery life.

• Safety: Batteries that are in poor condition or have been damaged can pose a safety hazard, such as overheating or exploding.

• Cost: Replacing batteries can be expensive, and maintaining good battery health can prolong their lifespan and save money in the long run.

• Environment: Proper disposal of damaged or depleted batteries is important for environmental reasons, as they can release harmful chemicals and contribute to pollution.

* To maintain good battery health, it is recommended to avoid exposing batteries to extreme temperatures or moisture, and monitor usage to prevent overcharging or draining the battery too much.

💡 Battery Guru offers several features to enhance your phone's battery life, including the ability to set fixed charge and temperature alarms for extending battery lifespan.
Additionally, you can monitor application usage and wake-locks since the last unplug to further optimize battery performance.

These features include:


• Measure real battery capacity (in mAh) and dual battery configuration is also supported.
• Set charge and temperature alarms to prolong battery lifespan.
• Monitor application usage and wake-locks since last unplug.
• Check the remaining charge time and use time.
• Check the percentage of deep sleep and awake time.
• Get detailed ongoing notification for real-time battery statistics.
• Monitor your phone’s battery charging and discharging history.
• Set reminders for battery temperature, charging limits, and abnormal battery usage.
• Get estimated battery health at any time.
• Battery Widget and Status Bar Indicator Battery Guru also offers a widget that displays your phone's battery information on your home screen,
including the remaining charge time, battery level, and temperature. You can also choose a status bar indicator based on your needs,
such as electric current, temperature, battery level, or a combination of them.

User Reviews:


Here's what our users have to say about Battery Guru:
"Amazing app! It gives so much information about my battery and really helps me take better care of it." - John S.
"Battery Guru is a must-have app for anyone who wants to get the most out of their phone's battery. Highly recommend!" - Sarah L.

Technical Requirements:


Battery Guru requires Android 6.0 and up to run.

title: Battery Guru: Battery Health

creator: Paget96
descriptionHtml:
Battery Guru - Monitor your Phone's Battery Life



Battery Guru is the ultimate app for monitoring your phone's battery. It offers comprehensive insights into your device's power usage, battery health, and more.

With this app, you can monitor your battery's capacity, set alarms and reminders, and get real-time statistics to your usage.
With a variety of features at your fingertips, you can easily monitor your battery's performance.

🪫 With Battery Guru, you can monitor your battery's capacity, set alarms and reminders for charging and temperature thresholds, and receive real-time statistics on your usage.
With a variety of features at your fingertips, you can easily monitor your battery's performance.

🏆 Battery Guru is a helpful tool that provides insights into the health of your phone's battery. By monitoring your battery's health,
you can take proactive steps to ensure that it remains in good condition and performs optimally.

🔋 Battery Health Monitoring
Battery health refers to the condition and performance of a battery, which can deteriorate over time and usage. It is important to monitor and maintain battery health for several reasons:

• Performance: As batteries degrade, their ability to hold a charge and provide power diminishes, leading to reduced performance and shorter battery life.

• Safety: Batteries that are in poor condition or have been damaged can pose a safety hazard, such as overheating or exploding.

• Cost: Replacing batteries can be expensive, and maintaining good battery health can prolong their lifespan and save money in the long run.

• Environment: Proper disposal of damaged or depleted batteries is important for environmental reasons, as they can release harmful chemicals and contribute to pollution.

* To maintain good battery health, it is recommended to avoid exposing batteries to extreme temperatures or moisture, and monitor usage to prevent overcharging or draining the battery too much.

💡 Overall Battery Statistics
Battery Guru offers wide range of battery statistics suitable for all users.

These features include:


• Measuring battery capacity (in mAh) with support for dual battery configurations.
• Setting charging and temperature alarms at configured thresholds.
• Monitoring application battery usage and wake-locks since the last unplug.
• Checking remaining charge time and usage time.
• Monitoring the percentage of deep sleep and awake time.
• Receiving detailed ongoing notifications for real-time battery statistics.
• Tracking your phone's battery charging and discharging history.
• Setting reminders for battery temperature, charging limits, and abnormal battery usage.
• Obtaining estimated battery health at any time.
• Battery Widget and Status Bar Indicator: Battery Guru also offers a widget that displays your phone's battery information on your home screen, including remaining charge time, battery level, and temperature. Customize your status bar indicator based on your preferences, whether it's electric current, temperature, battery level, or a combination.

Technical Requirements:


Battery Guru requires Android 6.0 and up to run.

To assist with translating our app, please visit: https://www.paget96projects.com/help-translating-apps.html

title: Battery Guru: Monitor & Health

creator: Paget96
descriptionHtml:
🏆 Battery Guru: Your Premier Battery Monitor
Battery Guru is the ultimate app for monitoring your phone's battery, providing insights into your device's power usage, battery health, and more, including charging speed, battery voltage, estimated capacity, and detailed statistics separated by screen on/off cycles.

📊 Battery Insights and Management
With this app, you can actively oversee your battery's capacity, configure alarms and reminders for battery level, temperature, and increased usage, while also gaining real-time usage statistics. The wide array of features at your disposal allows you to seamlessly monitor your battery's performance. Alarms serve as a valuable tool, alerting you when your battery reaches specific temperature and level thresholds.

🔋 Battery Health Monitoring
Battery health refers to the condition and performance of a battery, which can deteriorate over time and usage. It is important to monitor and maintain battery health for several reasons:

• 🚀 Performance: As batteries degrade, their ability to hold a charge and provide power diminishes, leading to reduced performance and shorter battery life.

• 🛡️ Safety: Batteries that are in poor condition or have been damaged can pose a safety hazard, such as overheating or exploding.

• 💰 Cost: Replacing batteries can be expensive, and maintaining good battery health can prolong their lifespan and save money in the long run.

• 🌍 Environment: Proper disposal of damaged or depleted batteries is important for environmental reasons, as they can release harmful chemicals and contribute to pollution.

Pro Tip: To maintain good battery health, avoid extreme temperatures and monitor usage to prevent overcharging or over-discharging.

By actively monitoring your battery's well-being, you can take proactive steps to ensure it remains in optimal condition. Battery Guru employs its proprietary algorithm to estimate battery capacity, which includes a comprehensive analysis of past battery charging history for enhanced accuracy. With each charging cycle, Battery Guru becomes more adept at precisely estimating battery health. While battery health is subject to fluctuations due to temperature changes and aging, Battery Guru strives to provide realistic statistics rooted in the app's measured past battery history.

📈 Overall Battery Statistics
Battery Guru provides a wide range of battery statistics suitable for all users. To ensure user understanding, the app includes informative tip cards that describe each functionality, helping you grasp the meaning and behavior of your battery.

These features include:
• Measuring battery capacity with support for dual battery configurations.
• Obtaining estimated battery health at any time.
• Setting battery level and temperature alarms at configured thresholds, allowing the app to notify you.
• Monitoring application battery usage and wake-locks since the last unplug.
• Checking time until a full charge and remaining time until your battery reaches 0%.
• Monitoring deep sleep and awake time to understand when your device remains awake when the screen is off.
• Receiving detailed ongoing notifications for real-time battery statistics.
• Saving your phone's battery charging and discharging history.

🤝 Contact us:
For support, please visit our Telegram chat:
https://www.t.me/Paget96_Projects

To assist with translating our app, please visit:
https://www.paget96projects.com/help-translating-apps.html
descriptionShort: Monitor phone's battery usage and accurately estimate its current health

With this app, you can actively oversee your battery's capacity, configure alarms and reminders for battery level, temperature, and increased usage, while also gaining real-time usage statistics. The wide array of features at your disposal allows you to seamlessly monitor your battery's performance. Alarms serve as a valuable tool, alerting you when your battery reaches specific temperature and level thresholds.

🔋 Battery Health Monitoring
Battery health refers to the condition and performance of a battery, which can deteriorate over time and usage. It is important to monitor and maintain battery health for several reasons:

• 🚀 Performance: As batteries degrade, their ability to hold a charge and provide power diminishes, leading to reduced performance and shorter battery life.

• 🛡️ Safety: Batteries that are in poor condition or have been damaged can pose a safety hazard, such as overheating or exploding.

• 💰 Cost: Replacing batteries can be expensive, and maintaining good battery health can prolong their lifespan and save money in the long run.

• 🌍 Environment: Proper disposal of damaged or depleted batteries is important for environmental reasons, as they can release harmful chemicals and contribute to pollution.

Pro Tip: To maintain good battery health, avoid extreme temperatures and monitor usage to prevent overcharging or over-discharging.

By actively monitoring your battery's well-being, you can take proactive steps to ensure it remains in optimal condition. Battery Guru employs its proprietary algorithm to estimate battery capacity, which includes a comprehensive analysis of past battery charging history for enhanced accuracy. With each charging cycle, Battery Guru becomes more adept at precisely estimating battery health. While battery health is subject to fluctuations due to temperature changes and aging, Battery Guru strives to provide realistic statistics rooted in the app's measured past battery history.

📈 Overall Battery Statistics
Battery Guru provides a wide range of battery statistics suitable for all users. To ensure user understanding, the app includes informative tip cards that describe each functionality, helping you grasp the meaning and behavior of your battery.

These features include:
• Measuring battery capacity with support for dual battery configurations.
• Obtaining estimated battery health at any time.
• Setting battery level and temperature alarms at configured thresholds, allowing the app to notify you.
• Monitoring application battery usage and wake-locks since the last unplug.
• Checking time until a full charge and remaining time until your battery reaches 0%.
• Monitoring deep sleep and awake time to understand when your device remains awake when the screen is off.
• Receiving detailed ongoing notifications for real-time battery statistics.
• Saving your phone's battery charging and discharging history.

descriptionHtml:
Battery Guru is the ultimate app for displaying battery info of your phone and tablet! With a wide range of features, we offer everything users need.

Set battery alarm, check battery temperature while charging, when fully charged, monitor battery health, all about battery life in a simple way. With Battery Guru, you have everything in the palm of your hand.

🔋 WHY USE BATTERY GURU?
We always listen to our community, and that's why we offer many well-packed features and regular app updates. With this app, you can actively oversee your battery capacity, configure alarms and reminders for battery level, battery temperature, and increased power draw, while also gaining real-time usage statistics.


🔌 Battery Info
Unlike others, our battery app offers comprehensive battery info right after opening the app. Screen-on time, battery usage, information regarding the electric current, battery voltage, power, and many other details. We also take in account that one of the biggest degradation factors of the battery is temperature, which we show as a graph over time. We also offer deep sleep and awake metrics so you can better understand idle drain.


🛡️ Battery Health
Battery health estimation is the process of determining your battery's current condition and capacity compared to its original capacity when it was new. Over time, batteries degrade due to factors like charging cycles, temperature, and usage patterns. This degradation reduces the battery's ability to hold a charge and shortens its overall lifespan. While battery health fluctuates due to temperature changes and aging, Battery Guru strives to provide realistic statistics. We have a dedicated section for battery health estimation and helpful tips to maintain good battery health.


⏰ Battery Alarm
Set personalized alarms to receive alerts when your battery reaches specific thresholds. Choose the sounds you want and configure alarms for various situations, including battery heat, full charge, low battery level, and even unusually high power usage. These alarms can help you develop better charging habits and prevent unexpected shutdowns.


💡 Learning & Patterns
Battery Guru constantly learns about your device's power usage habits. The longer you use the app, the smarter it becomes, providing more accurate measurements tailored to your specific needs. All the data used for learning and estimations can be found in a dedicated history section for easy access.


🤝 Need help? Contact us!
If you have any questions about Battery Guru, encounter issues using the app, or simply need help understanding any of the displayed metrics, please feel free to contact our support team directly. You can reach us through various channels:

title:
Battery Guru: Battery Health
2.3.7

creator: Paget96
descriptionHtml:
🏆 Battery Guru: Your Premier Battery Monitor
Battery Guru is the ultimate app for monitoring your phone's battery, providing insights into your device's power usage, battery health, and more, including charging speed, battery voltage, estimated capacity, and detailed statistics separated by screen on/off cycles.

📊 Battery Insights and Management
With this app, you can actively oversee your battery's capacity, configure alarms and reminders for battery level, temperature, and increased power draw, while also gaining real-time usage statistics. The wide array of features allows you to seamlessly monitor your battery's performance. Alarms serve as a valuable tool, alerting you when your battery reaches specific temperature and level thresholds.

🔋 Battery Health Monitoring
Battery health refers to the condition and performance of a battery, which can deteriorate over time and usage. It is important to monitor and maintain battery health for several reasons:
• 🚀 Performance: As batteries degrade, their ability to hold a charge and provide power diminishes, leading to reduced performance and shorter battery life.
• 🛡️ Safety: Batteries that are in poor condition or have been damaged can pose a safety hazard, such as overheating or exploding.
• 💰 Cost: Replacing batteries can be expensive, and maintaining good battery health can prolong their lifespan and save money in the long run.
• 🌍 Environment: Proper disposal of damaged or depleted batteries is important for environmental reasons, as they can release harmful chemicals and contribute to pollution.

Pro Tip: To maintain good battery health, avoid extreme temperatures and monitor usage to prevent overcharging or over-discharging.

By actively monitoring your battery's well-being, you can take proactive steps to ensure it remains in optimal condition.
Battery Guru employs its proprietary algorithm to estimate battery capacity, which includes a comprehensive analysis of past battery charging history for enhanced accuracy. With each charging cycle, Battery Guru becomes more adept at precisely estimating battery health.
While battery health is subject to fluctuations due to temperature changes and aging, Battery Guru strives to provide realistic statistics rooted in the app's measured past battery history.

📈 Overall Battery Statistics
Battery Guru provides a wide range of battery statistics suitable for all users. To ensure user understanding, the app includes informative tip cards that describe each functionality, helping you grasp the meaning and behavior of your battery.

These features include:
• Measuring battery capacity with support for dual battery configurations.
• Obtaining estimated battery health at any time.
• Setting battery level and temperature alarms at configured thresholds, allowing the app to notify you.
• Monitoring application battery usage since the last unplug.
• Checking time until a full charge and remaining time until your battery reaches 0%.
• Monitoring deep sleep and awake time to understand when your device remains awake when the screen is off.
• Receiving detailed ongoing notifications for real-time battery statistics.
• Insights into your phone's battery charging and discharging history.

🤝 Contact us: For support, please visit our Telegram chat: https://www.t.me/Paget96_Projects

To assist with translating our app, please visit: https://www.paget96projects.com/help-translating-apps.html
descriptionShort: Monitor battery usage, view advanced info, and check your phone's battery health

title:
Battery Guru: Battery Health
2.3.8

creator: Paget96
descriptionHtml:
Battery Guru is your go-to app for monitoring battery health, voltage, temperature, and real-time power usage. It tracks charging speed, electric current, and provides estimates for charging/discharging times. Access past session history, monitor deep sleep, and view insights on battery health and performance. Features include customizable notifications, battery-saving themes, charge alarms, and support for dual battery devices. Keep your battery in top shape with Battery Guru.

📈 Battery Statistics
• App usage: We measure foreground app battery usage on your device (i.e., the time when you are interacting with the app)
• Charging electric current & discharging electric current: Shows real-time updates of charging and discharging electric current and represents them on a live graph. You can also check the minimum, maximum, and average charging and discharging electric current
• Charging speed & discharging speed: Displays real-time updates of charging speed and discharging speed, measured in mAh per hour and percentage per hour, respectively
• Charging time & discharging time: Provides estimates of the remaining time for both charging and discharging sessions, giving you a clear view of how long it will take to reach a full charge or depletion
• History data access: View all past sessions recorded by the app and gain insights into your phone's battery charging and discharging history
• Type of Charging: Detects and displays the charging method used for your device, whether it's AC, USB, dock, or wireless
• Estimated Capacity: Based on historical data, the app generates an estimated capacity that reflects the battery's health at a given moment
• Monitoring deep sleep and awake time: Understand when your device remains active while the screen is off
• Dual battery support: Monitor and manage battery performance on devices with dual battery setups

💊 Battery Health
Battery health refers to the condition and battery performance, which can deteriorate over time and usage
It is important to monitor and maintain battery health for several reasons:
• 🚀 Performance: As batteries degrade, their ability to hold a charge and provide power diminishes, leading to reduced battery performance and shorter battery life
• 🛡️ Safety: Batteries that are in poor condition or have been damaged can pose a safety hazard, such as overheating or exploding
• 💰 Cost: Replacing batteries can be expensive, and maintaining good battery health can prolong their lifespan and save money in the long run
• 🌍 Environment: Proper disposal of damaged or depleted batteries is important for environmental reasons, as they can release harmful chemicals and contribute to pollution

Pro Tip: To maintain good battery health, avoid extreme temperatures and monitor usage to prevent overcharging or over-discharging.

🔋 Battery saving features:
• Close the app after 5 minutes of inactivity to save battery usage
• Dark and AMOLED black themes as battery saver features
• Reduce notification updates to reduce power draw

🔔 Notifications:
• Ongoing customizable notification: Check live battery information anytime from the notification shade with a customizable, ongoing notification
• Charge alarm: Reminds you when battery level is low or high
• Temperature alarm: Alerts you when the battery temperature is elevated
• Battery full alarm: Notifies you when the battery is full
• Battery full reminder: Prompts you to fully charge your battery, as it's recommended to do so periodically
• High power usage: Notifies you when power usage is higher than usual
• Notification Icons: Customize status bar with various indicators to reflect different battery statuses

For any question or support, contact: support@batterymentor.com

title:

creator: Paget96
descriptionHtml:
Battery Guru: Smarter Battery Management for Android

Battery Guru provides advanced tools to monitor battery health, track charging statistics, and analyse battery performance. With real-time data, sound notifications, and alarms, Battery Guru helps you stay informed about your battery usage.

🔋 Battery Health
Batteries degrade over time, losing capacity with every charge. Battery Guru provides valuable insights by monitoring battery health and usage trends, helping you understand your battery’s condition.

- Set full battery alarms to remind you to unplug your charger.
- Track your battery’s health percentage and capacity (mAh).
- Analyse how much wear your battery endures during charging.

📊 Battery Usage
Battery Guru measures actual battery usage with precision, providing detailed statistics to improve your understanding of power consumption.

- Monitor how much power each app uses in real-time.
- See how long your device lasts in active or standby mode.
- Analyse how often your device woke from deep sleep.
- Track power usage and discharge rates for better efficiency.

⚡ Charging Insights and Sound Notifications
Ensure safe and efficient charging with Battery Guru’s advanced tools. Receive sound notifications and alarms to stay informed.

- Set full battery alarms and custom charge alerts to stay informed during charging.
- Check your battery’s current temperature and track historical temperature data.
- Measure charging speed and find the safest and fastest chargers.
- View the maximum charging temperature during sessions.

🌡️ Hardware Monitoring
Battery Guru provides real-time insights into your device’s hardware performance.

- Monitor current temperature to ensure safe operating conditions.
- Track voltage, current (mA), and power (Watts) for detailed hardware statistics.
- Access weekly graphs to analyse trends in battery performance and charging.

📈 Highlights
- Real-time notifications for battery statistics and charge levels.
- Measure true battery capacity (mAh) and track wear over time.
- Set sound alarms for full charge, high temperature, and more.
- View detailed battery history, including temperature and charging sessions.
- Measure charging speed, including fast charging rates, and evaluate cables and chargers for efficiency.
- Monitor fast charging sessions and view maximum charging power achieved.

💎 Pro Features
- Unlock an ad-free experience for uninterrupted monitoring.
- Access detailed historical data and advanced insights.
- Custom Overlays: Monitor live battery data while multitasking.

Battery Guru is trusted by millions of Android users for its intuitive design, accurate data, and advanced monitoring tools. Whether you need to track battery temperature, improve charging habits, or understand power consumption, Battery Guru is your all-in-one solution.

Need help? Contact us at support@batterymentor.com.

creator: Paget96
descriptionHtml:
Easily monitor your battery's health, performance, charging and more with Battery Guru – a robust battery app designed for users who wish to track their device's battery usage, charging speed, and temperature in real time.

Battery Guru provides comprehensive battery insights, delivering detailed statistics on battery health, charging sessions and power consumption. With real-time monitoring, you can analyse discharge rates, cycle counts and energy usage, ensuring a thorough understanding of your device's battery life.

💎 Pro Features
- Enjoy an ad-free experience for uninterrupted monitoring.
- Access detailed historical data and advanced battery performance insights.
- Use Custom Overlays to track live battery data while multitasking seamlessly.

🔋 Battery Health
Batteries naturally lose capacity over time with repeated charging cycles. Our battery monitor helps you track and understand battery usage effectively. The battery health check utilises historical data to provide detailed diagnostics for deeper insights.

- Set battery full alarms and temperature alerts to keep you informed.
- Monitor battery health percentage and actual capacity (mAh) over time.
- Analyse wear per charge cycle and keep an eye on maximum charging temperatures.

⚡ Battery Usage
Our battery usage monitor measures actual battery consumption, offering in-depth insights into energy usage and battery quality.

- Monitor real-time battery usage and view key statistics effortlessly.
- Assess how long your device lasts during active use or in standby mode.
- Analyse the battery power consumption of each app.
- Track how frequently your device wakes from deep sleep to identify inefficiencies.

🔔 Battery Alarm & Notification
Receive battery sound notifications, and stay updated with detailed battery alerts.

- Battery full alarms notify you when your battery reaches 100%.
- Battery low alarms warn you when your battery level drops too low.
- Get notified about battery temperature, voltage and power usage.
- Customise notifications with a battery icon and percentage indicator.

🌡️ Hardware Monitoring
Real-time metrics help you better understand your device's hardware performance.

- Track battery voltage, electric current (mA) and power (Watts) with precision.
- Use weekly graphs to analyse battery performance.
- Monitor USB charging performance to identify the most efficient chargers and cables.

📲 Homescreen Widgets
- Check battery temperature, current battery level and charging status directly from your home screen with a battery indicator widget. Enjoy a sleek, adaptive widget that provides real-time info.

📈 Highlights
- Real-time notifications for battery statistics and charge levels.
- Measure actual battery capacity (mAh) and monitor wear over time.
- Access detailed battery history, including temperature and charging records.
- Evaluate chargers and cables for performance using charging speed tests.
- Monitor fast charging sessions and review maximum achieved power outputs.
- Analyse historical charging data to review patterns and maximum session temperatures.
- Estimate charging times to determine when your battery will be fully charged.

Battery Guru is renowned for its user-friendly design, insightful analytics and dependable monitoring tools. Whether you wish to track battery health, understand power consumption or manage charging sessions, Battery Guru is here to help.

📧 Contact & Support
Have questions or feedback? Help us improve Battery Guru!
📩 Email us at support@batterymentor.com for assistance.

title:

2.3.19.2

creator: Paget96
descriptionHtml:
Easily monitor your battery’s health, performance, charging, and temperature in real time with Battery Guru. Get detailed battery insights, custom alerts, and powerful widgets to help you better understand your device’s battery.

📌 Highlights
- Monitor battery health, temperature, and usage in real time.
- Access detailed battery statistics and historical charging data.
- Set customisable battery alarms and notifications.
- Use adaptive widgets for quick battery status checks.
- Evaluate charger and cable performance based on power metrics.
- Estimate charging and discharging times with precision.

🔋 Battery Health & Diagnostics
Track how your battery’s condition evolves over time.

- Monitor health percentage and actual capacity (mAh).
- Analyse battery wear per charging cycle.
- Observe maximum temperatures during charging sessions.

📈 Usage Insights & Analytics
Gain a clear picture of how your battery is used daily.

- View real-time usage statistics and trends.
- Monitor performance during active and standby use.
- Identify power-draining apps and background inefficiencies.
- Track device wake-ups from deep sleep.

🔔 Battery Alarms & Notifications
Stay informed with helpful alerts.

- Set alarms for full charge, low battery, or high temperature.
- Customise notification sounds and icons for your status bar.
- Receive timely updates about battery status and conditions.

⚡ Charging Performance Tracking
Measure how your device charges with precision.

- Monitor charging speed, voltage, and power (Watts).
- Compare chargers and cables by observing charging performance.
- Track real-time electric current (mA).

📲 Homescreen Widgets
Access essential battery info at a glance.

- Adaptive widgets showing battery level, temperature, and charging status.
- Sleek, intuitive design for quick updates.

💎 Upgrade to Pro (Optional)
Unlock advanced battery insights and features.

- Ad-free monitoring experience.
- Access extended historical data for long-term trends.
- Use overlays to view live battery stats while multitasking.

Battery Guru helps you stay informed about your battery’s condition, usage, and charging performance. Whether you’re tracking health, reviewing power trends, or monitoring charging sessions, Battery Guru offers the insights you need.

📧 Contact & Support
Questions or feedback? We're here to help!
📩 Email us at support@batterymentor.com

Thank you for choosing Battery Guru.
